Comment: This is technically called adcvd in the industry, not tariffs as we know them today. It stands for antidumping counter vailing duties. These assigned rates are company specific, not country of origin.    This investigation was a multi year effort started in the biden administration. The rate is based upon the quantity and price of cheap, unfairly priced solar panels being sent to the usa by individual companies. One company was hit at +3000%, some at 50%.    Most foreign solar panel companies are not affected by this, just the bad ones. This is the correct way to have a trade war. Punish the bad companies,  not the entire  country.
Author: DrJJStroganoff

Comment: This technically is called "anti dumping / countervailing" in the industry. Only select companies that are selling product at clearly unfair prices are targeted, and they each have their own percentage rate.  This was a multi year investigation that started in the biden administration. They followed Chinese companies that were exporting cheap parts to other countries to avoid having a country of origin "china" on their finished good and be subject to higher tariffs.  Edit: downvoted for being right? Read the article, it's company specific, and not country or even product specific.  Only the bad companies are having these adcvd rates put on their products.
Author: DrJJStroganoff

Comment: This review of solar panels was started under the biden administration to help protect us solar panel companies.  It only effects certain foreign companies that are unfairly dumping cheap goods into the market, and is not a country specific tariff that trump has been floating out.
